movies.title: Batman Begins
movies.description: The origins of the Batman legend and the Dark Knight's emergence as a force for good in Gotham City.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: Batman teams up with Commissioner Gordon and the new District Attorney to take on a psychotic bank robber known as The Joker.

movies.title: Hannibal Rising
movies.description: The story of Hannibal Lecter's early years and his transformation into a serial killer.

movies.title: John Wick 2
movies.description: John Wick is forced out of retirement and embarks on a mission to take down the world's deadliest assassins.
